description: This is the main page component of a React-based frontend application for managing personal notes, incorporating fetching, creating, editing, and deleting notes functionalities.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches the list of notes from the backend API.

methods.name: handleOpenCreate
methods.description: Opens modal for creating a new note.

methods.name: handleOpenEdit
methods.description: Opens modal for editing an existing note.

methods.name: handleCreateNote
methods.description: Sends a request to create a new note to the backend API.

methods.name: handleEditNote
methods.description: Sends a request to update an existing note.

methods.name: handleRequestDelete
methods.description: Prepares to delete a note by setting the note ID.

methods.name: handleConfirmDelete
methods.description: Confirms deletion and sends delete request to the backend API.
